name: @renderdev/threadpool
description: Quickly run CPU-intensive tasks in parallel across all JavaScript environments with a unified, type-safe API

scripts.test:all: pnpm run test && pnpm run bun:test && pnpm run deno:test && pnpm run deno:web:test
scripts.test:dist: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.test:dist:coverage: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 vitest run --config vitest.config.ts --coverage
scripts.bun:test: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=bun BUN=1 bun vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.bun:test:dist: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=bun BUN=1 bun vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.bun:test:watch: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=bun BUN=1 bun vitest --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.bun:test:dist:watch: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=bun BUN=1 bun vitest --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.deno:test: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.deno:test:dist: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest run --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.deno:test:watch: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.deno:test:dist:watch: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.deno:web:test: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest run --config vitest.deno.config.ts
scripts.deno:web:test:dist: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest run --config vitest.deno.config.ts
scripts.deno:web:test:watch: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest --config vitest.deno.config.ts
scripts.deno:web:test:dist:watch: cross-env VITEST_ALIAS_DIR=dist NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 RUNTIME=deno DENO=1 DENO_UNSTABLE_SLOPPY_IMPORTS=1 deno run -A npm:vitest --config vitest.deno.config.ts
